web_snippets: From a very early age, Theresa Bruno recognized her affinity for real estate, kindled by a fascination with architectural diversity and design.
Theresa Bruno began her career in the financial sector, serving as advertising director at Regions Bank, before joining Perry Harper & Perry PR & Advertising.
Theresa Bruno's reputation for well-positioned marketing has been growing for 28 years. Having earned a master of arts at the University of Alabama at ...
